meanings.definition: Reinforced with a triangular piece of fabric
meanings.sent1: The bag had gusseted corners for extra strength.
meanings.sent2: She wore gusseted gloves to protect her hands.
meanings.sent3: The superhero's cape was gusseted to withstand strong winds.
meanings.sent4: The fortress walls were gusseted with steel reinforcements.
meanings.sent5: The gusseted seams held the tent together securely.

meanings.sent1: The pillow was soft and gusseted for added comfort.
meanings.sent2: The chair had a gusseted seat for better support.
meanings.sent3: The gusseted socks kept his feet warm in the snow.
meanings.sent4: Her gusseted purse had extra compartments for organization.
meanings.sent5: The gusseted waistband of the pants allowed for easy movement.

meanings.definition: To add a gusset to something
meanings.sent1: She gusseted the bag to make it more spacious.
meanings.sent2: The tailor gusseted the dress to give it a better fit.
meanings.sent3: He gusseted the backpack to accommodate more books.
meanings.sent4: They gusseted the tent to prevent it from collapsing in the wind.
meanings.sent5: The designer gusseted the jacket for a stylish look.
